scripts.populate: jest -t 'Test the location microservice POST methods'
scripts.sparkDbInit1: echo "db.createCollection('sensorData', { 'timeseries': {timeField: 'timestamp', metaField: 'id', granularity: 'minutes'}, expireAfterSeconds: 31536000})" | mongosh spark
scripts.sparkDbInit2: echo "db.createCollection('pointData', { 'timeseries': {timeField: 'timestamp', metaField: 'id', granularity: 'minutes'}, expireAfterSeconds: 31536000})" | mongosh spark
